name: Faithful Service
Lore: 'Unlike the Empire, the Alliance treats their droids with respect. Many droids volunteered to share the risk of battle and aid the Rebellion''s assault on the Death Star.',
Text: 'Deploy on an opponent''s location. Whenever you lose a droid from hand or Life Force, it satisfies Force loss up to its forfeit value. Once per turn, you may play Scomp Link Access to cancel a Force drain where you have a droid. Effect canceled if opponent controls this location.',
